text: (ye vah vakt) tha jab kaafiron ne apane dilon mein zid thaan lee thee aur zid bhee to jaahiliyat kee see to khuda ne apane rasool aur momineen (ke dilon) par apanee taraf se tasakeen naazil faramaee aur unako parahezagaaree kee baat par qaayam rakha aur ye log usee ke sazaavaar aur ahal bhee the aur khuda to har cheez se khabaradaar hai
